data_table.description: This subject phenotype table includes subject's sex, age at blood draw, and phenotype study (Amish Family HAPI Heart Study, Amish Family Longevity Study, and Amish Family Wellness Study). The variables collected at baseline visit are anthropometric measures (n=5; weight, height, bmi, whr, and waist), age, myocardial infarction, T2D, stroke, pregnancy status, CAC score and age, IMT thickness and plaque, EKG measures (n=4; QRS, QT, PR, and heart rate), inflammatory markers (n=4, fibrinogen, CRP, IL-6, Lpa), blood pressure (n=2, SBP and DBP), fasting insulin and glucose measures, blood measurements (n=10; WBC, hemoglobin, hematocrit, RBC, and platelets), metabolic measures (n=5; creatine, LDL, HDL, triglycerides, and total cholesterol), lung capacity (n=2; FVC and FEV), medications (n=3; hypertension, T2D, and lipid), and smoking status.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified Subject ID

variable.name: baseline_study
variable.description: Phenotype study

variable.name: SEX
variable.description: Sex of participant

variable.name: age_baseline
variable.description: Age at baseline study

variable.name: age_at_dna
variable.description: Age at blood draw

variable.name: pregnant_baseline
variable.description: Pregnant at baseline visit

variable.name: weight_baseline
variable.description: Weight at baseline visit

variable.name: waist_baseline
variable.description: Waist circumference at baseline visit

variable.name: whr_baseline
variable.description: Waist hip ratio at baseline visit

variable.name: height_baseline
variable.description: Height at baseline visit

variable.name: bmi_baseline
variable.description: Body mass index at baseline visit

variable.name: mi_baseline
variable.description: Self report heart attack at baseline visit

variable.name: stroke_baseline
variable.description: Self report stroke at baseline visit

variable.name: cac_agatston_score
variable.description: Coronary artery calcification score

variable.name: cac_score_age
variable.description: Age when CAC score was obtained

variable.name: imt_mean_farwall_cca_baseline
variable.description: Carotid intima-media far wall thickness at baseline visit

variable.name: imt_anyplaque_baseline
variable.description: Any presence of carotid plaque as measured by IMT at baseline visit
variable.value: Yes, presence of plaque in carotid artery
No presence of plaque in carotid artery

variable.name: current_smoker_baseline
variable.description: Current smoking status of participant at baseline visit

variable.name: fibrinogen_baseline
variable.description: Fibrinogen value at baseline visit

variable.name: crp_baseline
variable.description: CRP value at baseline visit

variable.name: il6_baseline
variable.description: IL6 value at baseline visit

variable.name: lpa_baseline
variable.description: Lipoprotein A value at baseline visit

variable.name: sbp_baseline
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure at baseline visit

variable.name: dbp_baseline
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure at baseline visit

variable.name: htn_med_baseline
variable.description: Taking medication for hypertension at baseline visit

variable.name: t2diabetes_baseline
variable.description: Has Type 2 diabetes based on medication, self-report, fasting glucose at baseline visit
variable.value: Yes, has t2 diabetes by fasting glucose, medication, and/or self-report

variable.name: t2d_med_baseline
variable.description: Taking medication for type 2 diabetes at baseline visit

variable.name: fastinsulin_baseline
variable.description: Fasting insulin value at baseline visit

variable.description: Fasting glucose value at baseline visit

variable.description: QRS duration measured by electrocardiogram at baseline visit

variable.description: QT interval measured by electrocardiogram at baseline visit

variable.description: PR interval measured by electrocardiogram at baseline visit

variable.description: Heart rate measured by electrocardiogram at baseline visit

variable.name: white_blood_cell_count_baseline
variable.description: White blood cell count value at baseline visit

variable.description: Hemoglobin value at baseline visit

variable.description: Hematocrit value at baseline visit
